title: Mental & Behavioral Health
description: NYU Langone psychiatrists and psychologists specialize in treating mental and behavioral health conditions in adults and children. Learn more.
cleaned_text: We use cookies and similar tools to give you the best website experience. By using our site, you accept our [ Websites Privacy Policy](https://nyulangone.org/policies-disclaimers/websites-privacy-policy). Our psychiatrists and psychologists specialize in treating mental and behavioral health conditions in adults through our comprehensive programs at [NYU Langone Psychiatry Associates](/locations/nyu-langone-psychiatry-associates) and in children through our renowned [Child Study Center](/locations/child-study-center). We excel in diagnosing [schizophrenia](/conditions/schizophrenia), among many other conditions. We also offer expert care to military veterans and their families through the [Steven and Alexandra Cohen Veterans Center](/locations/cohen-veterans-center) and the [Steven A.
